sentences.chinese: 感染性心内膜炎是继发性瓣膜腱索断裂的主要原因。

sentences.english: Conclusion Sufentanil can safe for heart valve replacement surgery.
sentences.chinese: 结论舒芬太尼可安全的用于心脏瓣膜置换手术。

sentences.english: His heart has divided into four chambers and its valves are beginning to form.
sentences.chinese: 他的心脏已经分成了四个腔室，瓣膜也开始形成了。

sentences.english: All limbs were performed with superficial venous operation and external valvuloplasty of femoral vein valve.
sentences.chinese: 所有肢体均行浅静脉手术加股静脉瓣膜外修复成形术。

sentences.english: All necessary valving is included also.
sentences.chinese: 所有所需要的瓣膜也包括在内。

sentences.english: Valvar stenosis is most frequently associated with a bicuspid valve or other cardiovascular malformation.
sentences.chinese: 瓣膜狭窄多为二瓣叶畸形且常合并其他心血管畸形。

sentences.english: No patients with significant valve disease or regional wall motion abnormality were included.
sentences.chinese: 所有患者均无严重瓣膜病或节段性室壁运动异常。

sentences.english: A chronic bacterial infection of the endocardium and heart valves; symptoms develop slowly.
sentences.chinese: 细菌感染引起的慢性心内膜和心瓣膜发炎。

sentences.english: Conclusion The valvuloplasty operations are firstly elected in cardiac valve operations of children.
sentences.chinese: 结论儿童心瓣膜手术时，首先选择瓣膜成形术。

sentences.english: Conclusion The valvuloplasty operations are firstly elected in cardiac valve operations of children.
sentences.chinese: 结论儿童心瓣膜手术时，首先选择瓣膜成形术。

sentences.english: The backward flow of blood through the valve is called mitral valve regurgitation.
sentences.chinese: 这种血液的反向流过瓣膜称为“二尖瓣反流”。

sentences.english: Objective To study effects of mitral valve replacement on the old with mitral valve diseases.
sentences.chinese: 目的回顾性研究老年心脏瓣膜病的治疗效果。

sentences.english: Each valve has a set of flaps called leaflets or cusps . These seal or open the valves.
sentences.chinese: 每一个瓣膜都有一套瓣片来进行打开和关闭动作。

sentences.english: Each of your heart's ventricles has an outlet valve.
sentences.chinese: 每一侧的心室都有一个出口瓣膜。

sentences.english: If the heart failure is caused by a valve disorder, then surgery is usually performed.
sentences.chinese: 如果心衰是由瓣膜病引起的，通常将施行手术。
